response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and my proposal aims to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects a fair valuation while allowing you to secure an asset that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I believe this price point offers you excellent value, ensuring you receive a high-quality product without exceeding your budget significantly. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product or this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
